name: Fattori
info:
Fattori's Painting

The painting is signed by Giovanni Fattori (Livorno 1825 - Firenze 1908), even though no authenticity test on authorship has been officially validated. It is a wooden substrate of small dimensions (10x15 cm) painted with oil colors and with a varnish layer applied. It belongs to the Macchiaioli art movement (the Italian precursor of the French Impressionism.

Courtesy of University of Verona. Data acquired with the Multi-spectral RTI light dome setup.
